brokers

Class ShoppingCartBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • brokers.ShoppingCartBroker

  • public class ShoppingCartBroker
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShoppingCartBroker()
      Creates a shopping cart broker (establishes a connection to the connection broker)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPhotoToCart(int userid, int photoid, int duration, boolean exclusive)
      Adds a photo to the user's shopping cart
      void checkout(int userid)
      Save the shopping cart items to the transaction history

      Closes the connection

      removes all of the photos from a users shopping cart

      returns the html code for the table that contains the shopping cart items and includes a link to checkout and empty cart.
      java.lang.String getTransactionList(int userid)
      gets the transaction list of all the item in the transaction history and will also create the HTML code required to print out

      • ShoppingCartBroker

    • Method Detail

      • addPhotoToCart

        public void addPhotoToCart(int userid,
                  int photoid,
                  int duration,
                  boolean exclusive)
        Adds a photo to the user's shopping cart
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of shopping cart's user
        photoid - the id of the photo being added to the shopping cart
        duration - the number of months the user is licensing the photo for
        exclusive - a boolean representing whether or not the user wants an exclusive license or not

      • removePhotoFromShoppingCart

        public void removePhotoFromShoppingCart(int userid,
                               int photoid)
        removes a photo from the user's shopping car
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the shopping cart's user
        photoid - the id of the photo to be removed

      • emptyShoppingCart

        public void emptyShoppingCart(int userid)
        removes all of the photos from a users shopping cart
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the shopping cart's user

      • getShoppingCart

        public java.lang.String getShoppingCart(int userid)
        returns the html code for the table that contains the shopping cart items and includes a link to checkout and empty cart. also calculates and displays the sum of the shopping cart
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the shopping cart's user
        Returns:
        the html code for shopping cart.
